rules.rule1: Rule 1 - Each row must contain the numbers from 1 to 9, without repetitions
rules.rule2: Rule 2 - Each column must contain the numbers from 1 to 9, without repetitions
rules.rule3: Rule 3 - Each 3x3 box must contain the numbers from 1 to 9, without repetitions
